mapper.sql: from_id, to_id, time, name, content, type, status
mapper.select:
select
from notifies where from_id = #{fromId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and type = 1 or type = 2

select
from notifies where to_id = #{toId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and type = 4 or type = 5
mapper.insert: insert into notifies (from_id, to_id, time, name, content, type, status) values (#{fromId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into notifies
from_id,
to_id,
time,
name,
content,
type,
status,
